ModMetaData.name: Cyanobot's Genes
ModMetaData.author: cyanobot
ModMetaData.description:
Approximately 50 new genes, functional and cosmetic, to add to your gene pool. Requires Biotech.
Genes: - 3 templates that generate genes dynamically from loaded xenotypes --- Offspring: carriers have offspring of a different xenotype to themselves --- Metamorphosis: carriers transform into a different xenotype at adulthood --- Implanter: carriers can implant a specific xenotype into others (not necessarily their own) - 2 hemogen-powered abilities - Bodyfeeder gene for getting hemogen primarily from human flesh - 5 diet genes: herbivores, carnivores, and obligate cannibals - more/less/no Recreation need - mental break threshold raised/lowered - 3 body size genes - 3 aging genes - Precocious gene that allows infants to take care of themselves from birth - genetic blindness/mutism - 7 trait-forcing genes including 2 new traits - claws, fangs, and tough skin - 14 more miscellaneous - head frills, tusks, and nostril slits - tabby-patterned fur - 2 tails - 2 blood colors, 3 eye colors, 1 alternative eye graphic - 3 hair bundles containing 17 hair colors - 3 skin bundles containing 17 skin colors
